verses.verse: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician שִׁ֣יר <S%H7892><s%> A Song מִזְמ֑וֹר <S%H4210><s%> [or] Psalm הָרִ֥יעוּ <S%H7321><s%> Make a joyful noise לֵ֝אלֹהִים <S%H430><s%> unto God כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> all ye lands

זַמְּר֥וּ <S%H2167><s%> Sing forth כְבֽוֹד־ <S%H3519><s%> the honour שְׁמ֑וֹ <S%H8034><s%> of his name שִׂ֥ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> make כָ֝ב֗וֹד <S%H3519><s%> glorious תְּהִלָּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H8416><s%> his praise

אִמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> Say לֵ֭אלֹהִים <S%H430><s%> unto God מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> How נּוֹרָ֣א <S%H3372><s%> How terrible מַעֲשֶׂ֑יךָ <S%H4639><s%> [art thou in] thy works בְּרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> through the greatness עֻ֝זְּךָ֗ <S%H5797><s%> of thy power יְֽכַחֲשׁ֖וּ <S%H3584><s%> submit לְךָ֣ אֹיְבֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H341><s%> shall thine enemies

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הָאָ֤רֶץ ׀ <S%H776><s%> All the earth יִשְׁתַּחֲו֣וּ <S%H7812><s%> shall worship לְ֭ךָ וִֽיזַמְּרוּ־ <S%H2167><s%> thee and shall sing לָ֑ךְ יְזַמְּר֖וּ <S%H2167><s%> unto thee they shall sing שִׁמְךָ֣ <S%H8034><s%> [to] thy name סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

לְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> Come וּ֭רְאוּ <S%H7200><s%> and see מִפְעֲל֣וֹת <S%H4659><s%> the works אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God נוֹרָ֥א <S%H3372><s%> [he is] terrible עֲ֝לִילָ֗ה <S%H5949><s%> [in his] doing עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> toward בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> toward the children אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> of men

הָ֤פַךְ <S%H2015><s%> He turned יָ֨ם ׀ <S%H3220><s%> the sea לְֽיַבָּשָׁ֗ה <S%H3004><s%> into dry בַּ֭נָּהָר <S%H5104><s%> through the flood יַֽעַבְר֣וּ <S%H5674><s%> [land] they went בְרָ֑גֶל <S%H7272><s%> on foot שָׁ֝֗ם <S%H8033><s%> There נִשְׂמְחָה־ <S%H8055><s%> there did we rejoice בּֽוֹ׃

מֹ֘שֵׁ֤ל <S%H4910><s%> He ruleth בִּגְבוּרָת֨וֹ ׀ <S%H1369><s%> by his power עוֹלָ֗ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever עֵ֭ינָיו <S%H5869><s%> his eyes בַּגּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> the nations תִּצְפֶּ֑ינָה <S%H6822><s%> behold הַסּוֹרְרִ֓ים ׀ <S%H5637><s%> let not the rebellious אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay [יָרִימוּ כ] (יָר֖וּמוּ <S%H7311><s%> bring up ק) לָ֣מוֹ סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> themselves Selah

בָּרְכ֖וּ <S%H1288><s%> O bless עַמִּ֥ים ׀ <S%H5971><s%> ye people אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God וְ֝הַשְׁמִ֗יעוּ <S%H8085><s%> to be heard ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> and make the voice תְּהִלָּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H8416><s%> of his praise

הַשָּׂ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> Which holdeth נַ֭פְשֵׁנוּ <S%H5315><s%> our soul בַּֽחַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> in life וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and does not נָתַ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> and suffereth לַמּ֣וֹט <S%H4132><s%> to be moved רַגְלֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H7272><s%> not our feet

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בְחַנְתָּ֥נוּ <S%H974><s%> hast proved אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> For thou O God צְ֝רַפְתָּ֗נוּ <S%H6884><s%> us thou hast tried כִּצְרָף־ <S%H6884><s%> is tried כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> us as silver
הֲבֵאתָ֥נוּ <S%H935><s%> Thou broughtest בַמְּצוּדָ֑ה <S%H4686><s%> us into the net שַׂ֖מְתָּ <S%H7760><s%> thou laidst מוּעָקָ֣ה <S%H4157><s%> affliction בְמָתְנֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H4975><s%> upon our loins

הִרְכַּ֥בְתָּ <S%H7392><s%> to ride אֱנ֗וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> Thou hast caused men לְרֹ֫אשֵׁ֥נוּ <S%H7218><s%> over our heads בָּֽאנוּ־ <S%H935><s%> we went בָאֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> through fire וּבַמַּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> and through water וַ֝תּוֹצִיאֵ֗נוּ <S%H3318><s%> but thou broughtest us out לָֽרְוָיָֽה׃ <S%H7310><s%> into a wealthy
אָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> I will go בֵיתְךָ֣ <S%H1004><s%> into thy house בְעוֹל֑וֹת <S%H5930><s%> with burnt offerings אֲשַׁלֵּ֖ם <S%H7999><s%> I will pay לְךָ֣ נְדָרָֽי׃ <S%H5088><s%> thee my vows

אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Which פָּצ֥וּ <S%H6475><s%> have uttered שְׂפָתָ֑י <S%H8193><s%> Which my lips וְדִבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken פִּ֝֗י <S%H6310><s%> and my mouth בַּצַּר־ <S%H6862><s%> when I was in trouble לִֽי׃

עֹ֘ל֤וֹת <S%H5930><s%> unto thee burnt sacrifices מֵחִ֣ים <S%H4220><s%> of fatlings אַעֲלֶה־ <S%H5927><s%> I will offer לָּ֭ךְ עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> With קְטֹ֣רֶת <S%H7004><s%> with the incense אֵילִ֑ים <S%H352><s%> of rams אֶ֥עֱשֶֽׂה <S%H6213><s%> I will offer בָקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> bullocks עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with עַתּוּדִ֣ים <S%H6260><s%> with goats סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

לְכֽוּ־ <S%H1980><s%> Come שִׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> [and] hear וַ֭אֲסַפְּרָה <S%H5608><s%> and I will declare כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִרְאֵ֣י <S%H3373><s%> all ye that fear אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> God אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> of what עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> what he hath done לְנַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> for my soul

אֵלָ֥יו <S%H413><s%> to him פִּֽי־ <S%H6310><s%> unto him with my mouth קָרָ֑אתִי <S%H7121><s%> I cried וְ֝רוֹמַ֗ם <S%H7318><s%> be extolled תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> with לְשׁוֹנִֽי׃ <S%H3956><s%> my tongue

אָ֭וֶן <S%H205><s%> iniquity אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If רָאִ֣יתִי <S%H7200><s%> If I regard בְלִבִּ֑י <S%H3820><s%> in my heart לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> will not יִשְׁמַ֣ע ׀ <S%H8085><s%> will not hear אֲדֹנָֽי׃ <S%H136><s%> the Lord

אָ֭כֵן <S%H403><s%> [But] verily שָׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> hath heard אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> God הִ֝קְשִׁ֗יב <S%H7181><s%> [me] he hath attended בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> to the voice תְּפִלָּתִֽי׃ <S%H8605><s%> of my prayer

בָּר֥וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> [be] God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> Who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor הֵסִ֘יר <S%H5493><s%> which hath not turned away תְּפִלָּתִ֥י <S%H8605><s%> my prayer וְ֝חַסְדּ֗וֹ <S%H2617><s%> nor his mercy מֵאִתִּֽי׃ <S%H854><s%> chief
